name: 黃瀅瑛
objective:
本課程之目的在於教導學生能夠以線性代數中所提供之各種方法來求解線性連立方程組，並奠定研習線型規畫，作業研究，等課程之基礎。

Introductory course to linear algebra and its applications.
schedule:
W01: Introduction
W02: Matrix multiplication
W03: Matrix multiplication
W04: Inverses & transposes
W05: TBD
W06: Inverses & transposes
W07: Vector spaces
W08: Linear transformations
W09: Midterm exam
W10: Orthogonal vectors
W11: Projections & least squares
W12: Orthogonal bases
W13: Determinants
W14: Eigenvalues & eigenvectors
W15: Eigenvalues & eigenvectors
W16: Diagonalization
W17: Difference equations & differential equations
W18: Final exam
scorePolicy:
Homework, in-class performance & quiz: 30%
Midterm: 35%
Final exam: 35%
materials:
Gilbert Strang, Linear Algebra and Its Applications, Brooks/Cole, 4th ed. (2006)
ISBN: 0-03-010567-6
